unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: What's Going Viral?
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: What's Going Viral?

unnormalised: Hey everyone! What's the latest making waves across Instagram and TikTok? Seems like "clean girl" aesthetic is finally taking a backseat, folks are craving authenticity. Remember when dalgona coffee was *the* thing? Trends are fleeting, aren't they?
normalised: Hey everyone! What's the latest making waves across Instagram and TikTok? Seems like "clean girl" aesthetic is finally taking a backseat, folks are craving authenticity. Remember when dalgona coffee was the thing? Trends are fleeting, aren't they?

unnormalised: Currently, we're seeing a huge surge in relatable desi content. Think: reels about the struggles of finding the perfect saree for Diwali or hilariously awkward arranged marriage encounters.
normalised: Currently, we're seeing a huge surge in relatable desi content. Think: reels about the struggles of finding the perfect saree for Diwali or hilariously awkward arranged marriage encounters.

unnormalised: Food-wise, it's not just about fancy restaurants. Videos showcasing how to make the perfect Hyderabadi biryani, passed down through generations, are racking up millions of views. Influencer Neha Sharma's "Aaji's Biryani Secrets" series is blowing up!
normalised: Food-wise, it's not just about fancy restaurants. Videos showcasing how to make the perfect Hyderabadi biryani, passed down through generations, are racking up millions of views. Influencer Neha Sharma's "Aaji's Biryani Secrets" series is blowing up!

unnormalised: Even meme templates featuring Ambanis are doing the rounds!
normalised: Even meme templates featuring Ambanis are doing the rounds!

unnormalised: On the brand side, companies are hopping on the bandwagon by collaborating with smaller, more authentic creators. It's all about connecting with the audience on a personal level, ditching the overly polished image. Expect more raw, real, and very desi content taking over your feeds soon. 100% guarantee, guys!
normalised: On the brand side, companies are hopping on the bandwagon by collaborating with smaller, more authentic creators. It's all about connecting with the audience on a personal level, ditching the overly polished image. Expect more raw, real, and very desi content taking over your feeds soon. one hundred percent guarantee, guys!
